snippet.title: B/R's Best of the Web
snippet.description: Bleacher Report's new section featuring links to the best sports-related content from around the web.

snippet.title: NFL Mock Draft 2014: Where Each Team Will Go with 1st-Round Pick
snippet.description: Get ready for the return of the NFL to Radio City Music Hall. On May 8, the nation's top prospects will hear their names called, signaling the final part of their journeys on the long road to the NFL...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: Best Possible Move for Every 1st-Round NFL Franchise
snippet.description: As the May 8 date approaches for the first round of the 2014 NFL draft, all 32 franchises have pivotal decisions to make, but they also have one of the best arrays of players to choose from in history...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: Pick-by-Pick Guide to the First Round
snippet.description: With the initial rush of free agency firmly in the rearview mirror, NFL franchises have turned their attention firmly to the upcoming draft...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: Top Talents Sliding Down the 1st Round
snippet.description: So much of the NFL 's predraft process is focused on the top talents available and names moving up after all these workouts that it's easy to overlook the players who aren't going ...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: Moves Your Team Is Sure to Make on Draft Day
snippet.description: With pro-day workouts winding down and offseason programs set to begin this April, there's never been more buzz surrounding the 2014 NFL draft than now...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: What Your Team Is Likely to Do on Draft Day
snippet.description: The 2014 NFL draft is the next exciting event on the football calendar, and the anticipation from fans across the league and management on every team has the buzz surrounding draft day through the roof...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: Identifying Pro Bowlers and Busts from First Round
snippet.description: The NFL draft is a minefield lined with two extremes in busts and Pro Bowlers and everything in between. This is especially the case for the 2014 draft, a class that at face value is one of the deepest in perhaps more than a decade...

snippet.title: Chicago Bears Draft Countdown: Making a Case for Ra'Shede Hageman
snippet.description: As the Chicago Bears prepare for the 2014 NFL draft, Minnesota defensive tackle Ra'Shede Hageman is a player who has a lot of what the Bears are looking for...
